subject: Re: [junit] setting up resources once for the entire test cycle?
msgSnippet: ... My ignorance! I m not really familiar with the addons so when I heard the problem I thought a design twist would do the job. Well... If somebody thought
messageBody:
> This works, but introducing a BaseTestCase just to store global data is
> like using a sledgehammer to kill a fly.

:-)

> Since ResourceManager from JUnit-addons is just a big Singleton anyway,
> you might as well just use their implementation rather than build your own.

My ignorance! I'm not really familiar with the addons so when I heard the
problem I thought a design twist would do the job. Well... If somebody thought
about it before, there is no need to reinvent the wheel, isn't there?

Have a nice weekend!

> Yagiz
